# Ace Citizenship

> U.S. citizenship test preparation app for aspiring Americans

For comprehensive documentation, see: [llms-full.txt](https://acecitizenship.app/llms-full.txt)

## Overview

Ace Citizenship helps immigrants prepare for the USCIS naturalization interview. Study the official 128 civics questions, practice English reading/writing, and prepare for your interview with confidence.

## Key Features

- 128 Official USCIS Civics Questions (M-1778 format, Dec 2025)
- Spaced Repetition Learning for optimal retention
- State-Specific Content: Senators, Governor, Representative auto-populated
- Instant Feedback on answers
- Progress Tracking with streaks and statistics
- Light/Dark Mode support

## The Civics Test

During the naturalization interview, applicants answer 10 questions from the official pool and must get 6 correct. Questions cover:

- American Government (Constitution, branches, rights)
- American History (Colonial period, Civil War, civil rights)
- Integrated Civics (Geography, symbols, holidays)

## Pricing

- Free: All 128 civics questions with core study features
- One-Time Purchase: State-specific personalization and variations

## Platforms

- iOS (iPhone, iPad)
- App Store ID: 6532592671

## Contact

- Website: https://acecitizenship.app
